page.title: 05St. Marys Church C.Williams
page.content: The church is 900 years old & there was a place of worship there before that. The first vicar started in 1106 & there was a cross in 1086.St Mary's serves Ambrosden,Arncott & Blackthorn,& the vicar serves Merton & Piddington also. There is a choir of 6 children & usual congregation of 30\40.There is a weekly Family Communion & monthly Evensong.The oldest of the 8 bells, the Sanctus, was erected in 1336,the largest weighs over 1 ton.The oldest part is the main body of the church.There are no very old mon -uments but an 1822 picture shows that it has changed,but no real restoration work has been done.There was a painting on the west wall with a gallery.The font was in the middle below it & the pulpit was on one side.Cracked roofing stones at the east end are being res- tored & funds are raised to repair more leaks.Electric heating fitted 10yr ago.
